titles.title: A bill to amend title 46, United States Code, to enhance the safety of passengers and employees on ferries operating on Puget Sound.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Executive Comment Requested from State, DOT.
Referred to Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.
Field Hearings Held in Seattle, Washington.

bill.summary: 5/3/1988--Introduced. Amends Federal maritime law to require that ferry vessels operating on certain waters between the State of Washington and Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada (including Puget Sound, Washington), be equipped with life rafts to accommodate all passengers and employees.
